events.title: RTV CRON 0x4
events.description: The fourth episode of RTV CRON is coming June 26th! We'll be providing updates on our DEF CON 33 plans along with a live workshop.

events.title: RTV CRON 0x5
events.description: The fourth episode of RTV CRON is coming July 31st! We'll be providing updates on our DEF CON 33 plans along with a live workshop.

events.title: Red Team Village @ DEF CON 33
events.location: Las Vegas Convention Center, Red Team Village Area
events.description: Visit the village at DEF CON 33! We'll have a weekend packed with workshops, activities, swag, and so much more!

events.title: Cyber Wargames @ DEF CON 33
events.location: Las Vegas Convention Center, Competition Floor
events.description: Join us for Cyber Wargames at DEF CON 33! It's an exciting new collection of infrastructure attack-defense cyber games. Find out more by clicking on the link below!
